title: Count Occurrences
statement:
# Count Occurrences

Count how many times a target value appears in an array.

## Problem Description

Given an array of N integers and a target value T, count how many times T appears.

## Input Format

First line: two integers N and T
Second line: N space-separated integers

## Output Format

A single integer - the count of T in the array.

## Constraints

- 1 ≤ N ≤ 10^5
- -10^9 ≤ T, elements ≤ 10^9
